mapper.update: update sys_role set status = #{status} where id = #{roleId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.`role_key` FROM `sys_user_role` ur LEFT JOIN `sys_role` r ON ur.`role_id` = r.`id` WHERE ur.`user_id` = #{userId} AND r.`status` = 0 AND r.`del_flag` = 0

SELECT id,role_name,role_key,role_sort,`status` FROM sys_role WHERE del_flag = 0
AND `status` = #{status}
AND role_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{roleName},'%')
ORDER BY role_sort
